root: ^player: There's some kind of voice, it was trying to convince me to shoot you.
^player: And it felt like there was something forcing me to do it.
^player: but I managed to subside the urge
^friend: thanks man, I appreciate you not shooting me
^voice: you dissapoint me, you think your friendship will save you? IT WON'T!!!
^player: no problem, lets just keep moving
